sentences.sentence: A Spanish judge rejected the suit on procedural grounds.
sentences.translation: 一名西班牙法官以程序理由驳回了该起诉。

sentences.sentence: The two sides have spent most of their time wrangling over procedural problems.
sentences.translation: 双方花了大部分的时间争论程序上的一些问题。

sentences.sentence: All five cases share the same basic procedural history.
sentences.translation: 这五个案件都有相同的基本历审程序。
